name: 陳怡倩
objective: Main objective of this course is threefold: (1) to provide a review of essential grammar skills to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly; (2) to compose a paragraph that has clearly stated topic sentence with adequate development and appropriate organization; (3) to identify and correct sentence structure and syntactic problems.
schedule:
1	Course introduction
2      Adjective & noun clauses review	
3	Participial phrases & appositive phrases	
4	Sentence combining	
5	Writing Process & Paragraph Structure	
6      Punctuation
7	Mid-term exam	
8	Mid-term review
9      Writing Theme I: narrating	
10	Writing Theme I: Narrating (cont.)	
11	Writing Theme II: Describing	
12	Writing Theme II: Describing (cont.)	
13	Writing Theme III: Explaining	
14	Writing Theme III: Explaining (cont.)	
15	Writing Theme IV: Comparing or Contrasting	
16	Writing Theme IV: Comparing or Contrasting (cont.) 	
17	Final exam	
18	Final exam review
scorePolicy: Active participation & quizzes (15%); Assignments (50%); Mid-term (15%); Final (20%).
materials:
Azar, B.S. & Hagen, S.A. (2016). Understanding and using English grammar (5th ed.). Pearson Education.
